headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://challenges.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https://ui-avatars.com https://i.postimg.cc; frame-src https://challenges.cloudflare.com; connect-src 'self' https://challenges.cloudflare.com;
